name: Modular
description:
Part of a new "sketchbook" series. Every day, I spot specific details from my surroundings: artworks in exhbitions, architecture, nature. I then extract those details and turn them into simple, minimal schematics. A layer of light is then added to augment the 2D compositions and reveal their structure and depth.

2021.197
Made on day 197 of 2021
